segments.text: I notice the way the woman holds a plate, her focus so intense, it’s as if nothing else exists for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her indifference towards the overflowing sink strikes me as oddly poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel frustration boil within me—how could she not see the chaos around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost as if she’s blind to the dangers; the children might as well be invisible too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she could step back, even just for a moment, to survey the scene completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to getting a cookie, yet the risk is so high!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to call out to him but instead, I remain a silent observer of this perfect storm.
segments.speaker: PAR
